name: Scuderia Ferrari
bio: The most successful team in Formula 1 history, racing since 1950. Official merchandise directly from Maranello.

name: Mercedes-AMG F1 Team
bio: Eight-time Constructors' Champions with a legacy of engineering excellence and technological innovation.

name: Red Bull Racing
bio: Six-time Constructors' Champions known for pushing the boundaries of F1 technology and design.

name: McLaren F1 Team
bio: Nine-time Constructors' Champions with over 50 years of racing heritage and innovation.

name: RacingArt Studio
bio: Independent artist specializing in Formula 1 inspired digital art and contemporary racing designs.

name: SpeedCraft Leather
bio: Artisan leatherworker creating handcrafted F1-themed accessories and premium racing-inspired goods.

name: Racing Collectibles
bio: Specializing in limited edition F1 collectibles and scale model replicas for serious collectors.

name: CircuitDesign Co
bio: Design studio creating minimalist F1 circuit maps and racing-inspired graphic artwork.

name: MobileArt Designs
bio: Custom phone case designer specializing in personalized motorsport and F1 driver artwork.
